Components #

The VueVentus component system comes with a variety of components that are pre-configured with grouped Tailwind CSS classes controlled through Vue.js props.


Config Modules #

Review the Config Modules, Palette Config Modules, or drill down on any one module individually with the lists below:

Config Modules #

  • Transitions

Palette Config Modules #

  • AnchorDefault
  • BorderDefault
  • ButtonOutline
  • ButtonSolid
  • GroundConsole
  • GroundDefault
  • GroundMonochromatic
  • GroundPastel
  • TextDefault
